function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Uncertainty and variations in energy consumption may not be considered in the EUI estimation model, leading to discrepancies between estimated and actual values.","Impact":"Misleading energy performance evaluations and inability to accurately pinpoint energy-related issues in buildings.","Mitigation":"Include a margin of error in the EUI estimation to account for uncertainty and variations. Use more comprehensive energy modeling techniques that consider real-world variability.","Technologies":"Advanced energy modeling software that accounts for real-world energy consumption variations.","People":"Building energy auditors, energy efficiency professionals, building owners, and facility managers.","Owner":"Building energy auditors, energy efficiency professionals, and building owners."}]}
